description: Installation of new external grocery enclosure following the relocation of a ramp access and removal of existing external pagoda
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information in order for the LPA to assess the application fully and determine whether the proposal would be acceptable and comply with policies CS8, CS11, CS12, DM10, DM17 and DM19 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

The applicant is advised that the lowering of an existing window by 500mm on the side elevation would committee an alteration. As this is located on a side elevation the window must be obscure-glazed or non-opening unless the parts of the window which can be opened are more than 1.7 metres above the floor of the room in which the window is installed.

Please submit a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red and adjoining land owned by applicant in blue, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.The red outline in the submitted location plan is only in the main house, please amend the red outline to show the proposed site including main house, garden and compound.
